item.title: Android MalwareAnalysis
item.description: Follow @anir0y Android Malware Analysis Tools Static Analysis tools short Description ClassyShark Standalone android apps binary inspection tool.ClassyShark StaCoAn Mobile application static code analysis tool. APK-MiTM CLI application that automatically prepares Android APK files for HTTPS inspection. Dynamic Analysis tools short Description AppMon Automated framework for monitoring and tampering system API calls based on Frida.
